title: Famous People Say Goodbye to Fashion Designer Valentino
summary: Valentino was a famous fashion designer from Italy who made beautiful clothes for celebrities. He died at age 93 in Rome. Many famous people like Anna Wintour, Elizabeth Hurley, and Anne Hathaway went to his funeral in Rome on Friday. The funeral was at a big church called the Basilica of Saint Mary of the Angels and Martyrs. People outside held red ribbons because red was Valentino's favorite color. He dressed stars like Jackie Kennedy and Princess Diana. Valentino started his career in the 1950s and retired in 2008. His ashes will be placed in a cemetery in Rome. Even though he is gone, people in the fashion world will remember him as a great designer.

He started his career in the 1950s and became very successful, with clients like Jackie Kennedy and Princess Diana. In this case, many celebrities attended to honor Valentino's life and work in fashion.
